content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace group at positions (0, 0), (2, 0), and (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 13
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6, Source: {'copper-ore': 8}
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab - Status: NO_POWER, research: automation

### Electricity group
Consists of the following entities:
- Poles at positions (12.5, 13.5), (15.5, 15.5), (11.5, 13.5), ..., (20.5, 10.5), (9.5, 13.5), (10.5, 13.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available for the furnaces to operate. Check the inventory before starting smelting operations.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all entities requiring power, such as the lab, are connected to a power source. Check the electricity group for any disconnections or insufficient power supply.
